abstract: The Swiss bank has agreed to buy Bank of America Merrill Lynch’s private banking operations outside the United States, the latest consolidation move in the private banking industry.
snippet: The Swiss bank has agreed to buy Bank of America Merrill Lynch’s private banking operations outside the United States, the latest consolidation move in the private banking industry.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The Swiss bank Julius Baer agreed on Monday to buy the private banking operations outside the United States of Bank of America Merrill Lynch, in a deal that will increase the European firm’s assets under management by 40 percent.

headline.main: Swiss Bank Julius Baer to Buy Bank of America Unit
headline.print_headline: Julius Baer Buys a Bank of America Unit

abstract: The data is a painful reminder of how Greece, the weakest member of the euro zone, is chasing a moving target in trying to meet its bailout obligations.
snippet: The data is a painful reminder of how Greece, the weakest member of the euro zone, is chasing a moving target in trying to meet its bailout obligations.
lead_paragraph: The Greek economy continues to contract rapidly, official data showed on Monday, a painful reminder of how Greece, the weakest member of the euro zone, was chasing a moving target in trying to meet its bailout obligations.

headline.main: Greek Economy Shrank 6.2% in Second Quarter
headline.print_headline: Withering Quarter in Greece as Economy Slides 6.2%
